strapiEvent.name: Free Online Budgeting Class With Centsei Financial
strapiEvent.description:
We’re saving a FREE seat for you for this class we’re hosting with Centsei Financial Tuesday, June 13th, at 8p.

REGISTER FOR FREE

We are going over the proven framework that takes the guesswork out of getting ahead and actually saving money toward your biggest financial goal. 

REGISTER FOR FREE

HOW DO I KNOW IF THIS FREE CLASS IS FOR ME?

  • You want to start saving more money toward your biggest financial goal
  • You know you need to do something different with your money but you don’t know where to start 
  • You’re sick of unexpected expenses coming up that get in the way of saving money 
  • You want to stop spending hours on budgets you can’t stick with 

WHAT ARE WE COVERING IN THIS FREE CLASS?

  • The 4 BIG mistakes most people make when approaching saving money and how to fix them
  • How to select, implement and automate the right financial tools
  • The repeatable cycle that will allow you to complete any financial goal you set your mind to
  • How to stop arguing and stressing about money and make both of your dreams a reality

This online class is live. Can’t wait to see you there! 

Click here to register for the free class!

-Dan and Kay

P.S. If you can’t make it, sign up anyway, and we’ll send you the replay!
